name: KichlerConnects
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Digitally control your landscape lighting from your smartphone or tablet in minutes with the Kichler Connects™ app. 
Designed to work with our Kichler Smart Control Timer, this app allows you to utilize one of our preset lighting schedules, or create custom schedules of your own. 

Preset schedules can align with your location, dusk-to-dawn, and adjust to daylight savings times - allowing your to be in control of the beauty of your outdoors.

You can connect Alexa to your Kichler Connects products in a few simple steps:
1.Download “Kichler Connects” App and register an account
2.Configure some devices on “Kichler Connects” App
3.Download Amazon "Alexa" app and configure Echo with "Alexa" app
4.Search "Kichler Connects" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category
5.Click Enable skill, and you will be navigated to login page
6.Follow the instructions on the page to complete linking
7.Now all setup is finished.

You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
“Alexa,turn on my Landscape Lights”
“Alexa,turn on my Landscape Lights”
